plot: A show about the video gaming industry and culture. We interview classic arcade game world record holders, industry and anything else related to both modern and old school gaming.
title: Coin-Op TV
plot_es: A show about the video gaming industry and culture. We interview classic arcade game world record holders, industry and anything else related to both modern and old school gaming.
plot_en: A show about the video gaming industry and culture. We interview classic arcade game world record holders, industry and anything else related to both modern and old school gaming.
